sources.title: Buster Keaton starring in "College"
sources.description: I ran across this "video quality upgrade" of "College" starring Buster Keaton on archive.org that says "However there is no audio track. So feel free to add a PD musical background." so I added four piano sonatas by Mozart that I found on the internet - numbers 7, 8, 12, and 17.

metadata.Plot: A wild weekend is in store for three high school seniors who visit a local college campus as prospective freshmen.
metadata.Actors: Drake Bell, Kevin Covais, Andrew Lewis Caldwell
